item.title: Python basics for algorithm practices
item.author: Frederick
item.description: Actively updating… This post assume the reader to be familiar with at least one of other popular used programming language, preferably Java and C++; or know python before and just need refresh. Array Python’s array type is similar to C++’s vector or Java’s ArrayList. And for algorithm practice we usually use list, which will be introduced in next section. Ref: array â€” Efficient arrays of numeric values # create an array array('u', 'hello \u2641') array('l', [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]) array('d', [1.
